sentence.Network_cn: 一个脾气不好难以相处的男人

sentence.Network_en: She could be wayward, petulant, and disagreeable.
sentence.Network_cn: 她有时也会任性 、 脾气很坏 、 很暴躁.

sentence.Network_en: The weather is really disagreeable; one minute the sun shines, the next it is raining again.
sentence.Network_cn: 这天儿真别扭, 一会下雨,一会儿出太阳.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... disagree 不同意 disagreeable 不愉快的 disappear 失纵,消失.
托福考试词汇研究－Unit10_托福英语词汇_托福... ... disabuse v. 解惑；矫正 disagreeable a. 讨厌的事 disarray v. 杂乱.
讨字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 讨扰〖 thanksfortheentertainment〗 讨人嫌〖 disagreeable;annoying〗 讨生活〖 seekliving〗.
修饰人的形容词归纳_百度文库 ... diplomatic 老练的，有策略的 disagreeable 脾气坏的，不友好的 disciplined 守纪律的.

list.abs: That may be true.I disagree.　我不同意。I don't agree.
disagree... ... disagree with 和。。。意见一致跟人 disagree on 众议纷纭 disagree with 与…意见不一致（人） 不同意.
香水广告对消费者行为的影响问卷 - 知己知彼网 ... 中肯 Neutual 非常不同意 Strongly Disagree 电视 Television.
...用来描述会员对于调查各个项目的回答。采用5分制,从强烈反对(strongly disagree)到强烈赞同(strongly agree),3分为可疑(equivocal)。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'discordant, incongruous'): from Old French desagreable, based on agreer 'agree'

entry.tran: 令人不快的;讨厌的;不合意的
entry.def: Something that is disagreeable is rather unpleasant.

example.ex: ...a comfort kit designed to make flying an altogether less disagreeable experience.
example.tran: 让飞行总体上变得不再那么难受的舒适套装

entry.tran: 不友好的;脾气坏的;难相处的
entry.def: Someone who is disagreeable is unfriendly or unhelpful.

example.tran: 他是个肤浅、难相处的人。

means.word_mean: 2. not agreeing with your tastes or expectations;

sentences.sentence: "found the task disagreeable and decided to abandon it"

auth_sentence.content: An unequal and disagreeable tootooing on a horn.

auth_sentence.content: Many will think his egotism and self-regard disagreeable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many will think his egotism and self-regard disagreeable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many will think his egotism and self-regard disagreeable.

means.word_mean: (人)不友善的;难相处的;暴躁的
